attributes.action: Evacuation of British citizens from the Sudan
attributes.additional_details: It’s the duty of the parliament and the government to protect the British citizens abroad.
attributes.background: ( British Nationals) are trapped under Sudanese army and Rapid Support Forces Missiles in Sudan and surrounded by tanks in the Sudanese capital ( Khartoum). They are looking for means to escape, but roads are closed and not safe UK government needs to help urgently to evacuate peaceful citizens.
